price: Abͻneεfoͻ no behunu Ogya no, na wͻbɛhunu sε wͻrete ahwe mu, na wͻnnya εho kwati kwan biara (nnwane).
arabic: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waraā al-muj'rimūna al-nāra faẓannū annahum muwāqiʿūhā walam yajidū ʿanhā maṣrifan
